basic.description: Principles of design, analysis and implementation of efficient algorithms. Case studies from a variety of areas illustrate divide and conquer methods, the greedy approach, branch and bound algorithms and dynamic programming.
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Algorithms I

extra.enrollment_requirement: ELEC 276 or ELEC 278 and any discrete mathematics course and registered in BSCE. Contact department if discrete math. course is not listed.
